org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer

接口 MetricsStochasticBalancerSource

  • 所有超级接口:
    BaseSource, MetricsBalancerSource
    所有已知实现类:
    MetricsStochasticBalancerSourceImpl

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface MetricsStochasticBalancerSource
extends MetricsBalancerSource
    This interface extends the basic metrics balancer source to add a function to report metrics that related to stochastic load balancer. The purpose is to offer an insight to the internal cost calculations that can be useful to tune the balancer. For details, refer to HBASE-13965

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer.MetricsBalancerSource

        BALANCE_CLUSTER, METRICS_CONTEXT, METRICS_DESCRIPTION, METRICS_JMX_CONTEXT, METRICS_NAME, MISC_INVOATION_COUNT

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.BaseSource

        HBASE_METRICS_SYSTEM_NAME

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void updateMetricsSize(int size)
      Updates the number of metrics reported to JMX
      void updateStochasticCost(String tableName, String costFunctionName, String costFunctionDesc, Double value)
      Reports stochastic load balancer costs to JMX

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer.MetricsBalancerSource

        incrMiscInvocations, updateBalanceCluster

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.BaseSource

        decGauge, getMetricRegistryInfo, getMetricsContext, getMetricsDescription, getMetricsJmxContext, getMetricsName, incCounters, incGauge, init, removeMetric, setGauge, updateHistogram
